meta.title: Operation of Angle of Repose Apparatus

sections.purpose: To determine the angle of repose of powdered crude drugs and extracts as a measure of flow properties.
sections.scope: Applicable to pre-formulation and powder flow characterization in Pharmacognosy.
procedure: Place the apparatus on a level bench and ensure the funnel outlet is closed.
Fill the funnel with a known quantity of dry, sieved powder.
Position a graph paper or base plate below the funnel at a fixed height.
Open the outlet to allow powder to flow freely and form a conical heap.
Measure the height (h) of the heap and the radius (r) of the base.
Calculate the angle of repose using the formula: tan(Î¸) = h / r.
Record the results with powder identification and conditions.
precautions: Ensure powder is dry and free-flowing before testing.
Avoid vibration or air currents during measurement.
Use consistent funnel height for all determinations.
Clean the apparatus thoroughly between different powders.
Wear a mask when working with fine or allergenic plant powders.
